professions.name: Bard
professions.description: Increase (d8) Performing and any 3 of Melee Combat, Deception, Disguise, Reading People, Persuasion. Learn 1 spell. Take an instrument and a tool.

professions.name: Mage
professions.description: Increase (d8) Arcane Lore and any 2 of any other kind of Lore or Handwriting. Learn 2 spells.

professions.name: Priest
professions.description: Increase (d8) Religious Lore and any 1 of Melee Combat, Medicine, Reading People. Learn 2 spells. Take a light weapon and a tool.

professions.name: Scoundrel
professions.specialText: Increase two skills an additional time (d10)
professions.description: Increase (d8) Sneaking and any 3 from Climbing, Deception, Disguise, Ranged Combat, Running/Jumping, Sailing, Sleight of Hand, Trapping. Then increase (d10) two of them again. Take a light weapon and a tool.

professions.name: Warrior
professions.description: Increase (d8) Melee Combat and any 2 of Intimidation, Running/Jumping, Ranged Combat, Riding. Take a piece of armour and a weapon.
